ComicInfo.Title: Valhalla; The Spirit's Not for Hanging; Retribution!; Walk the Plank; The Little Red Schoolhouse
ComicInfo.Summary:
Final issue. Variant: White Logo on cover (see pic below). 1: Valhalla (cover) 2: The Spirit's 3: Retribution
Reprinted from Grimm's Ghost Stories (Gold Key) #9: 4: Walk The Plank Reprinted from Grimm's Ghost Stories (Gold Key) #10: 5: The Little Red Schoolhouse
